```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
chfs = read_csv("../data/ret2edu.csv")
```

## R Markdown



```{r}
summary(lm(data=chfs, income~edu))
```
```{r}
summary(lm(data=chfs, log(income)~edu))
```

```{r}
summary(lm(data=chfs, log(income)~degree))
```
```{r}
summary(lm(data=chfs, log(income)~edu+age))
```

```{r}
chfs = chfs %>% mutate(age2=age^2)
summary(lm(data=chfs, log(income)~edu+age+age2))
```
